price: (Yεka kyerεε Ayuub sε): “Fa berε (anaa εserε wira) wo nsa mma na fa bͻ (wo yere no) na hwε na wanyε bͻne anaa wammu bͻhyε so; na Yɛhunuu (Ayuub) sε (ͻyε onipa a) ͻwͻ aboterε. Nokorε sε akoa pa paa ne no. Nokorε sε ͻde ne ho nyinaa maa Onyankopͻn.
arabic: وَخُذۡ بِيَدِكَ ضِغۡثٗا فَٱضۡرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحۡنَثۡۗ إِنَّا وَجَدۡنَٰهُ صَابِرٗاۚ نِّعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakhudh biyadika ḍigh'than fa-iḍ'rib bihi walā taḥnath innā wajadnāhu ṣābiran niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
